Label: CT 110: Amortized Interest Rate Swap starting at 01/02/201
Description: Amortized Interest Rate Swap starting at 01/02/2015 with a Notional of USD 1000.0 which then decreases gradually until Maturity. The fixed leg is based on semi-annual payments at 1%, the floating leg is based on semi-annual payments at reference rate + 2%.
